name: BookStore Java Web App
postCreateCommand: sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install -y tomcat9 && mkdir -p target/classes && javac -d target/classes $(find src/main/java -name '*.java') && jar -cvf target/BookStore.war -C src/main/webapp/ . -C target/classes/ com && sudo cp target/BookStore.war /var/lib/tomcat9/webapps/ && sudo service tomcat9 start
